features: 【Discover Your Perfect Sleeping Experience】 After extensive testing and thousands of sleeping trials, we're thrilled to announce that memory foam pillows are the best pillows for sleeping both back support sleepers and small-medium frame side sleepers. With its unique 5-inch loft and specialized molding technique, the standard pillow has been designed to provide optimal support and alignment for your head, neck, and shoulders. We're confident that you'll love it as much as we do!

【Say Goodbye To Discomfort】 Made of high-density foam, cooling memory foam pillow offers a perfect blend of support and softness. Pillow for side sleepers provides ample support to keep your head and neck in alignment throughout the night, while still retaining its shape for maximum stability.

【The Secret To Deep Sleep】Unlike most memory foam pillows that are cut from larger pieces, inight memory foam pillows are shaped specifically to fit the contours of your body, helping to keep your spine aligned. Each of inight pillows for bed is carefully molded to exact specifications, ensuring that it fits your head and neck perfectly, and keeping a high level of consistency between products so that you can receive the same level of quality every time you purchase.

【Get Peace Of Mind With Inight Pillows】The back pillow has gained CertiPUR-US certification and the pillowcase is OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 certified. That means our neck pillow is free from harmful chemicals and safe for human use. Crafted from high-quality memory foam, pillows offer excellent durability and support. The foam maintains its shape over time, reducing the risk of lumps or flat spots developing.

【You Deserve a Better Sleep】Experience better sleep with our foam pillow! Conveniently compressed for shipping, simply unbox, remove the plastic packaging, and allow the firm pillow to decompress before use. Our soft pillows for sleeping come with a 110-night trial and a 10-year warranty, so you can enjoy your purchase with complete confidence. Reward yourself with a better side sleeper pillows for adults and enjoy better sleep now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dupe for tempurpedic cloud pillow!!
reviews.reviewText: This is almost an exact dupe for the tempurpedic cloud pillow! I have the cloud pillow and have used it for 2-3 years now every night. It is a fantastic pillow but was starting to get a bit too squishy and less firm than when I first purchased it so I thought it time to try a new pillow. I just so happen to find this pillow on amazon and decided to give it a shot because it is a good price. I am absolutely blown away by the quality of this inight pillow. It’s just as good if not BETTER than tempurpedic. When laying on the expensive tempurpedic cloud pillow and then immediately laying on the inight pillow they have a very similar feel, density, comfort, etc. It’s not too soft or too firm. It’s not too thick or thin. It’s the perfect height and density for side sleepers. The cover it comes in is high quality and soft. I can’t speak for the longevity because I’ve only had it a short time but I’m sure it will hold up just fine. I will update my review if I have any issues. This is a 100% honest review I purchased this pillow with my own hard earned money. I plan to purchase a few more since they are such a great price. I’ve tried soooo many memory foam pillows from Amazon and also mattress stores and this one is a real winner. I’m absolutely shocked at how great of a value this is. If you are looking for something similar to a tempurpedic cloud (if not better…) definitely get this! I love how this pillow has ventilation so your head doesn’t get too hot. Please don’t put memory foam in the washing machine. Only wash the cover. I saw a poor review where someone gave this pillow one star because they put the whole memory foam pillow in the washing machine. SMH. I thought it was common knowledge to not do this. I thought it was worth mentioning. Anyways, I 100% recommended this pillow! You really get bang for your buck. I would only go back to tempurpedic cloud if they stop making this pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Memory foam Pillow
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So I purchased the 5 inch memory foam pillow and the gel memory foam pillow which is 4.7 inches and found that there is not really much difference at all in the memory foam perhaps a one second rebound on the 5 inch memory foam, not certain why they call it memory foam because it really does not have much rebound like the original expensive ones but they certainly hold or shape and are very comfortable. In terms of the cooling gel, I really did not see much difference after 30 minutes of use it seem to reach a higher temperature of my body. Therefore, the gel will actually warm up to my faces body temperature and no longer would stay cool. I think that the concept is good but it does not stay cool very long. So I decided to return the memory gel foam and keep the 5 inch since it was thicker and works better for me. For most people I believe that would be a good height because it’s thick enough to support your neck if you suffer from whiplash injuries and providing you’re not a short person under five feet. I don’t only sleep on my back, but I sleep every which way as well as on my stomach so it seems to be a good size pillow and did not take very long to expand to its full size after opening the package. It also has a little bit of odor From the memory foam, but not extremely bad considering I have allergies. I believe it lasted probably five days at most if you let it air out. So anyway, I have to give it a good 5 star rating because all in all it is a very good and comfortable pillow. I no longer have headaches and sleep longer at night nor do I have kinks in my neck that I would get from other pillows so I do recommend this and hope that this comment will help you decide which pillow would work for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars it has consistent support through the whole pillow, a solid 4.5 rating.
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I need new pillows to replace our aging down fill pillows. That my wife strongly disliked for being too soft, but I liked because I sleep on all sides back, side and stomach. She recently purchased standard size memory foam pillows from Costco, that to me are like overstuffed pills that the pillows must wrapped in a pillowcase twice the size of the pillow. Therefore, the mission was to find a better pillow. I purchased the two top-rated King-size memory foam pillows on Amazon, the Weekender Gel Memory Foam Pillow and inight Memory Foam. Both are a good choice, however I preferred the Weekender only because it was a little firmer, especially towards the end of the pillow, and the middle was the same softness as the inight. Weirdly the inight is heavier than the Weekender. Also, to be clear we are keeping both brands of pillows. I found both pillow brands to hit the balance between soft and supportive, even when I moved from back to side to stomach, between the two brands I tried the Weekender was the more optimal of the two. This feature truly sets it apart from other pillows I have tried in the past and has greatly improved my sleep quality. These are hands down better than the down-filled pillows, IMHO. I also appreciate that the pillowcase is luxurious and machine-washable, which makes it easy to keep clean and fresh. I do slobber a bit – TMI.Overall, I highly recommend the Weekender Gel Memory Foam Pillow - king size to anyone in the market for a new pillow. It has exceeded my expectations and has greatly improved my sleep experience. My wife, who generally pops out of bed in the morning, wanted to stay in bed a little longer to enjoy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: depending on if you like the shape or not it’s fantastic. i’m a side sleeper and this give tremendous support. bought it a while back and it hasn’t faltered a bit. if you’re a stomach or back sleeper it may not work as well as it’s very dense and thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Memory Foam Pillow
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable pillow with washable pillowcase. Is very cooling pillow also.

After trying all sorts of foam pillows without being really happy with them, this one is perfect. It is really nicely made, and slightly soft for those who find some foam pillows too firm. Great price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: I hated it... now I love it.
reviews.reviewText: So, I will be completely honest, the first night I used this pillow I absolutely hated it. So much so that I got up at 3am, in a huff, to organise its return.The following day, after a dreadful night's sleep, I went for a nap and reluctantly didn't bother changing the pillow. I thought I would give it another try. Just to see whether it made any difference, I decided I would rotate it 180 degrees, so that the neck support was at the top. I appreciate that defeats the purpose of it, but I thought anything was worth a shot.Wow.I slept and slept, much like Jenny in Forrest Gump. The difference in comfort was unbelievable.If you are having trouble with the neck support, give it a little 18, sleep on the flat part and thank me later. The material of the pillow is wonderfully comfortable. It's firm and it stays much cooler than standard pillows.I am so glad I didn't let my initial lack of sleep force me to make a bad decision and return this pillow.

I had a similar pillow from IKEA and it was like sleeping on a rock. Bought these 2Pillows to replace and they are perfect, not to hard, not too soft. Very good quality for the price. Will use them for a long time. Bonus they come with a pillow protector cover.
Seitdem wir die Kissen haben schlafen wir besser. Und das beste ist das frühs die Finger nicht mehr taub sind.
